template.name: InfluxDB by HTTP
template.description:
Get InfluxDB metrics by HTTP agent from Prometheus metrics endpoint. For organization discovery template need to use Authorization via API token. See docs: https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.0/security/tokens/
Don't forget change macros {$INFLUXDB.URL}, {$INFLUXDB.API.TOKEN}. Some metrics may not be collected depending on your InfluxDB instance version and configuration.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback
Template tooling version used: 0.39

item.name: InfluxDB: Instance status
item.description: Get the health of an instance.

trigger.name: InfluxDB: Health check was failed
trigger.description: The InfluxDB instance is not available or unhealthy.

item.name: InfluxDB: Boltdb reads, rate
item.description: Total number of boltdb reads per second.

item.name: InfluxDB: Boltdb writes, rate
item.description: Total number of boltdb writes per second.

item.name: InfluxDB: Buckets, total
item.description: Number of total buckets on the server.

item.name: InfluxDB: Dashboards, total
item.description: Number of total dashboards on the server.

item.name: InfluxDB: Organizations, total
item.description: Number of total organizations on the server.

item.name: InfluxDB: Scrapers, total
item.description: Number of total scrapers on the server.

item.name: InfluxDB: Task runs failed, rate
item.description: Total number of failure runs across all tasks.

trigger.name: InfluxDB: Too many tasks failure runs (over {$INFLUXDB.TASK.RUN.FAIL.MAX.WARN} for 5m)
trigger.description: "Number of failure runs completed across all tasks is too hight."

item.name: InfluxDB: Task runs successful, rate
item.description: Total number of runs successful completed across all tasks.

item.name: InfluxDB: Workers currently running
item.description: Total number of workers currently running tasks.

item.name: InfluxDB: Workers busy, pct
item.description: Percent of total available workers that are currently busy.

item.name: InfluxDB: Telegraf plugins, total
item.description: Number of individual telegraf plugins configured.

item.name: InfluxDB: Telegrafs, total
item.description: Number of total telegraf configurations on the server.

item.name: InfluxDB: Tokens, total
item.description: Number of total tokens on the server.

item.name: InfluxDB: Users, total
item.description: Number of total users on the server.

trigger.expression: last(/InfluxDB by HTTP/influxdb.version,#1)<>last(/InfluxDB by HTTP/influxdb.version,#2) and length(last(/InfluxDB by HTTP/influxdb.version))>0
trigger.name: InfluxDB: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: InfluxDB version has changed. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: InfluxDB: [{#ORG_NAME}] Query response bytes, failed
item_prototype.description: Count of bytes returned with status not 200 per second.

item_prototype.name: InfluxDB: [{#ORG_NAME}] Query response bytes, success
item_prototype.description: Count of bytes returned with status 200 per second.

item_prototype.name: InfluxDB: [{#ORG_NAME}] Query requests bytes, failed
item_prototype.description: Count of bytes received with status not 200 per second.

item_prototype.name: InfluxDB: [{#ORG_NAME}] Query requests bytes, success
item_prototype.description: Count of bytes received with status 200 per second.

item_prototype.name: InfluxDB: [{#ORG_NAME}] Query requests, failed
item_prototype.description: Total number of query requests with status not 200 per second.

trigger_prototype.name: InfluxDB: [{#ORG_NAME}]: Too many requests failures (over {$INFLUXDB.REQ.FAIL.MAX.WARN} for 5m)

item_prototype.name: InfluxDB: [{#ORG_NAME}] Query requests, success
item_prototype.description: Total number of query requests with status 200 per second.

macro.description: Maximum number of query requests failures for trigger expression.
Maximum number of tasks runs failures for trigger expression.
